targets.expr: sum(rate(syswall_node_metrics_syscall_time{container=~"$container", group=~"$group", class=~"$class", pod=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace", err="OK"}[$ival])/1000000) by (syscall)

panels.title: Class: $class Group: $group TIME SPENT IN EXECUTION

targets.expr: sum(rate(syswall_node_metrics_syscall_count{container=~"$container", pod=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace", class=~"$class", group=~"$group", err!="OK"}[$ival])) by (err)
topk(10,sum(rate(syswall_node_metrics_syscall_count{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", class=~"$class", group=~"$group", err="OK"}[$ival])) by (container,pod,namespace))
topk(10,sum(rate(syswall_node_metrics_syscall_count{namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", class=~"$class", group=~"$group", err!="OK"}[$ival])) by (container,pod,namespace))
sum(rate(syswall_node_metrics_syscall_count{container=~"$container", class=~"$class", pod=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace",  class="$class", group="$group", err="OK"}[$ival])) by (syscall)
sum(rate(syswall_node_metrics_syscall_count{container=~"$container", class=~"$class", pod=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace",  class="$class", group="$group", err!="OK"}[$ival])) by (syscall,err)
sum(rate(syswall_node_metrics_syscall_count{container=~"$container", class=~"$class", pod=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace",  class="$class", group="$group", err="OK"}[$ival])) by (syscall)
sum(rate(syswall_node_metrics_syscall_count{container=~"$container",  pod=~"$pod", namespace=~"$namespace", class="$class", group="$group", err!="OK"}[$ival])) by (syscall)
